featured.text: The organization encourages consumers to choose brands that take precautions to protect elephants and has set up a certification program to reward tea growers who are doing it right.

definition.zh_def: 證書或認證，通常用於證明某人具備特定技能或知識。
definition.en_def: A document attesting to a status or level of achievement, often used to prove that someone has specific skills or knowledge.
definition.example: She received her certification in project management after completing the course.
